name: The Crabbiest Game
description:
Use the arrow keys to move the tetrominos around, space to rotate, and up to drop the piece. Try to make the path as even a possible so the wave doesn't reach you!

Game made in a couple of days for 2014's Summer Jam.

Team:

-Jesús Martínez: programming

-Alejandro Monzú: 2D and 3D art assets

-Iván del Blanco: Additional art
